---
title: "Construindo Mapas no R"
format: html
---

::: {.cell hash='Aula-16_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_1717fac61f705d88a1ba899a6930c6d0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
#remotes::install_github("ropensci/rnaturalearthhires")

library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthhires)
library(r4pde)
library(tidyr)

sbr <- RustSoybean
sbr2 <- sbr|> separate (planting, into = c("year","month", "day"), sep= "-",
           remove= FALSE)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula-16_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_7a76db732005ffb57bd76030e6d5274b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
BRA <- ne_countries(country= "Brazil",
                    returnclass= "sf")

library(tidyverse)

ggplot(BRA)+
  geom_sf(color= "white",
          fill = "darkgreen")+
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-16_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula-16_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_c0ef625989dc8b7a6368a72f4312ef22'}

```{.r .cell-code}
BRA <- ne_states(country= "Brazil",
                    returnclass= "sf")
MG <- BRA |> filter(name_en == "Minas Gerais")

library(tidyverse)
library(ggsn)

ggplot(BRA)+
  geom_sf(color= "black",
          fill = "white")+
  geom_sf(data= MG, color = "black", fill= "darkblue")+
  geom_point(data=sbr, aes(longitude,latitude), alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-16_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  theme_void()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

::: {.cell hash='Aula-16_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_32219f689c95eb61683cd6c3700506e8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(BRA)+
  #annotation_north_arrow (location = "bl",
                          #style = north_arrow_nautical())+
  #annotation_scale(location="br")+
  geom_sf(color= "black",
          fill = "white")+
  geom_point(data=sbr2, aes(longitude,latitude, color= year, 
                            size = severity), alpha = 0.5)+
  geom_hline(yintercept = -23, linetype= "dashed", color = "black")+
  theme_minimal()+
    labs(color = "Planting Year")+
    theme(legend.position = "right")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-16_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
  facet_wrap(~year)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

::: {.cell hash='Aula-16_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_19142aa20b434582d8fb5da9475ce57d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(sf)
shapefile <- st_read("malha/BR_Municipios_2022.shp")
```
